description: First edition of one of the earliest American color-plate publications. Title page and plates have legend: 'Painted by J. Shaw; engraved by J. Hill.' There are twenty hand-colored aquatint engravings. Issued in three parts with blue printed wrappers, 1820-21. Acquired from an undetermined source prior to 1970. This item has been digitized and conserved.
label: Picturesque views of American scenery : 1820
attribution: Permission to copy or publish must be obtained from the Booth Family Center for Special Collections, Georgetown University Library.
